# Rikonim Enterprise

## Website
https://rikonim.com/

## What we do
Rikonim Enterprise is a building and civil engineering company headquartered in Accra, Ghana. We deliver construction, infrastructure, and engineering services for public and private sector clients.

## Key pages
- Services: https://rikonim.com/services
- Projects: https://rikonim.com/projects
- Company: https://rikonim.com/about
- Leadership: https://rikonim.com/leadership
- Contact: https://rikonim.com/contact
